entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 70%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 70%
